title: Encore Interview: Jimmy O. Yang From 'Silicon Valley'
description: 'Silicon Valley' and 'Crazy Rich Asians' star Jimmy O. Yang spoke to Sam in 2018 about his book 'How To American: An Immigrant's Guide To Disappointing Your Parents.' Email the show at samsanders@npr.org.
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: Encore Interview: Jimmy O. Yang From 'Silicon Valley'
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: The comedian and actor went from DJ'ing at a strip club to starring in HBO's 'Silicon Valley' and the box office hit, 'Crazy Rich Asians.'
itunes:subtitle: The comedian and actor went from DJ'ing at a strip club to starring in HBO's 'Silicon Valley' and the box office hit, 'Crazy Rich Asians.'
